refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: C interface function which checks the length of a vector send as a parameter to the C function. You must include stack-c.h to benefit from this function. If the test fails, we return from the C interface and an adequate error message is printed in the Scilab console.
WARNING: This API is deprecated from Scilab 5.2.0 and is going to be removed with Scilab 6.0. Please use API Scilab (the new Scilab API).
